controller

Class CardGameRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CardGameRules

  • public class CardGameRules
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing the rules of the card game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates an empty CardGameRules object.

      Creates a CardGameRules object with the given pile references.

      • CardGameRules

        public CardGameRules(CardPile p1_handPile,
                     CardPile p2_handPile,
                     java.util.List<CardPile> p1_foundations,
                     java.util.List<CardPile> p2_foundations,
                     CardPile waste,
                     CardPile stock,
                     int handCardNum,
                     int pileCardNum)
        Creates a CardGameRules object with the given pile references.
        Parameters:
        standardPiles - Reference to the list of standard card piles.
        foundations - Reference to the list of foundation piles.
        waste - Reference to the waste pile.
        stock - Reference to the stock pile.
        handCardNum - Reference to number of cards dealt to player's hand.
        pileCardNum - Reference to number of cards dealt to piles.
